author: desruisseaux
msg: Use the Map approach in AbstractIdentifiedType for allowing extension with new properties in the future.
This is the same approach than AbstractIdentifiedObject. We will provide a builder in next SIS version
for making construction easier, similar to the ParameterBuilder we just experimented.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Added an example in Builder javadoc, minor other javadoc fixes and tests.
